common.name: Stone Golem
common.description: A slow but sturdy creature made of ancient rock.

common.name: Swift Rogue
common.description: A sneaky thief who strikes from the shadows.

common.name: Fire Imp
common.description: A mischievous demon that spits small fireballs.

common.name: River Serpent
common.description: A slippery snake that lurks beneath the water.

common.name: Woodland Archer
common.description: A skilled bowman who never misses a shot.

epic.name: Shadow Assassin
epic.description: A master of the night, striking without a trace.

epic.name: Stormcaller
epic.description: A powerful mage who commands the fury of storms.

epic.name: Frost Guardian
epic.description: An ancient warrior encased in enchanted ice.

epic.name: Infernal Warlock
epic.description: A dark sorcerer wielding forbidden fire magic.

epic.name: Bone Reaver
epic.description: A skeletal knight who reaps souls.

legendary.name: Celestial Dragon
legendary.description: A majestic dragon with the power of the cosmos.

legendary.name: Titan of the Abyss
legendary.description: A godlike being born from the darkest depths.

legendary.name: Phoenix King
legendary.description: A reborn ruler who wields the flames of eternity.

legendary.name: Eclipse Knight
legendary.description: A warrior bathed in the power of a dying sun.

legendary.name: Void Champion
legendary.description: A champion who rules the endless darkness.
